testimonials.title: What our users say
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands of professionals who found their dream job with ResumeRise

alex.quote: I got my dream job at a FAANG company thanks to ResumeRise! The templates are ATS-friendly and the editor is very intuitive.

sarah.quote: As an HR, I can spot a ResumeRise resume from a mile away - they always look polished and professional.

david.quote: The analytics feature helped me optimize my resume and after that I got 3x more interview invitations.

pricing.title: Transparent pricing for everyone
pricing.subtitle: Choose a plan that suits you. Cancel anytime.

free.name: Free
free.description: All you need to get started with resume building

pro.name: Pro
pro.description: For job seekers who want more features

items.question: Can I change my plan later?
items.answer: Yes, you can switch to a different plan at any time in your account settings.

items.question: How does the free trial work?
items.answer: The free trial is available for 14 days. After that, you will be charged the monthly price.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept all major credit cards, including Visa, Mastercard, and American Express, as well as PayPal.

items.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
items.answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time in your account settings. Your subscription will remain active until the end of the paid period.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to ResumeRise. These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of our website, products, and services ("Services").

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.content: To access certain features of our Services, you may need to create an account.

accountCreation.title: Account Creation
accountCreation.content: When you create an account, you must provide accurate and complete information. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.

accountResponsibilities.title: Account Responsibilities
accountResponsibilities.content: You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account. Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

content.title: Content
content.intro: Our Services allow you to create, upload, and share content.

userContent.title: User Content
userContent.content: You retain ownership of any intellectual property rights that you hold in your content.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will provide notice of material changes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at legal@resumerise.com.

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.subtitle: Learn how to use ResumeRise effectively

apiStatus.title: API Status
apiStatus.subtitle: Current status of our API services
